description: If you're looking for a new take on the classic&nbsp;Negroni cocktail, look no further than the Negroni Sbagliato.This variation uses&nbsp;sparkling wine instead of&nbsp;gin, giving it a bubbly twist perfect for sipping on a leisurely evening. Mix right in the glass for a fuss-free drink, or shake it up and serve in a coupe glass for an elegant touch. Cheers!
name: Negroni Sbagliato
